attributes.action: remove tax on redundancy payments (not inclusive of Pay in lieu of noitce)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Redundancy payments are compensation and should be allowed to be paid in full. Allowing the reciever the time to use funding for support while seeking re-employment.  Currently this payment is taxed as normal income when it is not, it is compensation for the fact that staff will have to find new empolyment, possibly reskill and start a career in a new company, frequently losing benefits they had established through service with thier previous employer.
